channel.title: Getting chicks
channel.description:
My friend sent this to me the other day. Plot was fun though a bit tedious, and I'm guessing a few of you can learn a thing or two from it.
It is mostly autobiographical, and I have no reason to doubt any of it. It traces the story of Neil, known as Style, and his conversion from an average guy to a straight up pimp. He first takes a workshop with a guru known as Mystery, who initiates his physical, emotional, and psychological transformation. He learns from a variety of other gurus on the seduction scene, and in the end, becomes one of the masters, encountering Paris Hilton, Courtney Love, and Britney Spears.
[url=http://junk.sneamia.net/game/Neil%20Strauss%20-%20The%20Game]The Game by Neil Strauss.[/url]
Btw, am I not allowed to upload files when I'm warned?

We’re talking about average looking guys who are nerds by nature.

item.title: Getting chicks
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I just really quickly browsed through, reading the shorter numbered parts.

Really interesting.

I say that because half the stuff I read, especially about the cocky-funny one are things I do naturally.
I’m a flirt by nature, and I do that with everyone unintentionally.

All my friends basically think I’m a whore lmfao. I hate it.

Read full topic
